text: It was a privilege to be cited by @TheEconomist in their detailed piece on vaccine hesitancy. A great report on what is driving it, its consequence and - crucially - how we can address it, particularly with minority communities. #vaccine #vaccinehesitancy #COVID19 #coronavirus https://t.co/EppiLXKkk8 https://t.co/SO3Gk0KQjz
